attributes.action: Agree to at least ONE e-petition, as nothing anyone puts forward seems to make a difference
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have been looking at this e-petition site almost since its inception, and as yet, i have NEVER seen any realistic and tangable action being taken by government. In fact, every response given by the P.M.s office seems to totally ignore the petition in question, and go on with the agenda it had before, without appearing to find any middle ground at all.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
